info.title: Aviationstack
info.description: The aviationstack API was built to deliver accurate data about global flights both in real-time as well as for historical flights. Being integrated with one of the most sophisticated aviation data provider on the market, the aviationstack API is capable of delivering real-time updates about ongoing flights with a delay of only 30-60 seconds.

flight_status.title: Flight Status

airport.title: Airport

icao.title: ICAO

scheduled.description: The scheduled departure date and time in RFC3339 (ISO8601) format. Example: 2019-12-12T04:20:00+00:00.
scheduled.title: Scheduled

estimated.description: The estimated departure date and time in RFC3339 (ISO8601) format. Example: 2019-12-12T04:20:00+00:00.
estimated.title: Estimated

delay.description: The delay in departure in minutes.
delay.title: Delay

estimated.description: The estimated arrival date and time in RFC3339 (ISO8601) format. Example: 2019-12-12T04:20:00+00:00.
estimated.title: Estimated

baggage.description: The baggage claim gate at the arrival airport.
baggage.title: Baggage

airline_iata.title: Airline IATA

get.description: This action tracking flights and retrieving flight status information in real-time.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify a limit of results to return in your API response. Maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify an offset for pagination. Example: Specifying an offset of 10 in combination with a limit of 10 will show results 10-20. Default offset value is 0, starting with the first available result.

parameters.name: flight_status
parameters.description: Filter your results by flight status. Available values: scheduled, active, landed, cancelled, incident, or diverted.

parameters.name: flight_date
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a flight date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Example: 2019-02-31.

parameters.name: dep_iata
parameters.description: Filter your results by departure city or airport using an IATA code.

parameters.name: arr_iata
parameters.description: Filter your results by arrival city or airport using an IATA code.

parameters.name: dep_icao
parameters.description: Filter your results by departure airport using an ICAO code.

parameters.name: arr_icao
parameters.description: Filter your results by departure airport using an ICAO code.

parameters.name: airline_name
parameters.description: Filter your results by airline name.

parameters.name: airline_iata
parameters.description: Filter your results by airline IATA code.

parameters.name: airline_icao
parameters.description: Filter your results by airline ICAO code.

parameters.name: flight_number
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a flight number.

parameters.name: flight_iata
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a flight IATA code.

parameters.name: flight_icao
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a flight ICAO code.

parameters.name: min_delay_dep
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a minimum amount of minutes in departure delay.

parameters.name: min_delay_arr
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a minimum amount of minutes in arrival delay.

parameters.name: max_delay_dep
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a maximum amount of minutes in departure delay.

parameters.name: max_delay_arr
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a maximum amount of minutes in arrival delay.

parameters.name: arr_scheduled_time_arr
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a arrival date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Example: 2019-02-31.

parameters.name: arr_scheduled_time_dep
parameters.description: Filter your results by providing a departure date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Example: 2019-02-31

limit.title: Limit

offset.title: Offset

iata_code.title: IATA Code

icao_code.title: ICAO Code

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate associated with the airport location.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate associated with the airport location.
longitude.title: Longitude

geoname_id.description: The GeoNames ID of the airport.
geoname_id.title: GeoName ID

timezone.description: The timezone the airport is in.
timezone.title: Timezone

phone_number.title: Phone Number

country_name.description: The name of the country the airport is in.
country_name.title: Country Name

country_iso2.description: The ISO code of the country the airport is in.
country_iso2.title: Country ISO

city_iata_code.description: The IATA code of the city the airport is in.
city_iata_code.title: City IATA Code
